isilib A Python library for simplifying bibliometric research of Web of Science data

Examples

import isilib
import networkx as nx

RC = isilib.RecordCollection("example_file.isi")
len(RC)

G = RC.twoModeNetwork('title', 'CR', recordType = True)
nx.draw_spring(G)
